attributes.action: research and try find a cure for chiari malformation
attributes.additional_details: chiari malformation also known as arnold chiari malformation needs to be researched more to try and find a cure. everyone needs there brain to function, and chiari malformation affects the brain and affects day to day living. chiari was first found in 1883 we are now 2015 thats 132 years ago? and still no cure!! so many people have/are suffring with this disease and it has taken many peoples lives. there must be something the department of health can do to try find a cure or something more to help.
